CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, pg. 3, reads: "JUNIOR MOTHERS CABARET - The fashionable Junior Mothers Club has gathered this dazzling array of talent for its second annual 'Smart Affairs Revue,' which will be held on Sept. 3, at the Greater Pittsburgh Airport's Horizon Room."
TitMainTitle: Seven women wearing shorts dance costumes, including Vivian Kiszie, Alma Speed Fox, Frances Bell Nunn, Evelyn Anderson, Lois Weaver Watson, possibly Betty Tibbs, and June Stokes, posed in interior with alternating block patterned floor, Wurlitzer stereo speaker, and landscape picture, for Junior Mothers cabaret event
